[Page Title: Private Member Club | Charleston Rifle Club | Charleston, SC]

top of page About 
The Charleston Rifle Club is a private recreational facility located on 14 acres on the banks of the Ashley River. Established in 1855, it has been a gathering place of families for decades.
â€‹ 
It boasts an outdoor pavilion, fishing dock and picnic area on a private island, as well as a Ballroom. While most of these amenities are for members only; the Ballroom is available as a rental for weddings, parties, and other events.
Membership Information Charleston Rifle Club is a private club.
The membership process is initiated by invitation. The Ballroom The Charleston Rifle Club ballroom is available to rent for private events. Please click below to view pictures and submit an inquiry. CRC Ballroom bottom of page
